list.name: Default Changelist
list.comment: Fixed prev commit issue. Solution, when using moshi model classes must be declared explicitly to be data classes

task.summary: Default task
Init Commit - NewsCycle
Login screen frontend title, input, and button. Login input button drawables
Created sqlite account Contract and Helper
Rest of the UI updates from prev commit
Added Home skeleton, login button set to auto advance
Implemented override methods in Main recycler view adapter
changed home screen menu by utilizing drawable utility syntax, change background, and adjusted button styling
Adjusted layout, fixing button positioning
Added scrollview to article page, and sample text
Added vector assests, deleted unnecessary file
Added DrawerLayout and supporting materials such as header. Implemented needed functions as well for the drawer. Still not working. Graphical change in home header.
Began Firebase Authentication setup. Prepared files to change login activity to use fragments for login vs. register vs. forgot passowrd.
Changed class inheritance to ViewModel and implement needed changes of a ViewModel
Implemented design and UI logic for user registration
Implement Login and Registration
Freeze. fleshed out implementation of api calls for top headline. Filled in annotation but not seeing autfills, also not sure weather call was sent and recieved.
Fixed prev commit issue. Solution, when using moshi model classes must be declared explicitly to be data classes
Completed implementation of first api call, parsing of JSON into data classes, and pushed to recycler view. Bug: Cards not displaying, check pipeline of data tomorrow
Fixed up card layout. Changed Font. Added images using glide. Added button ripple. Cleaned up article time.
Added myfeed, popular, and categories class fragment skeleton and UI skeletons. Set home to portrait only.
